Research.title: Computer Graphics
Research.details: The Graphics and Image Processing group is concentrated on developing techniques and algorithms for fast and efficient processing of images. Two BS projects and three MS thesis are currently under progress.

Research.title: Software Engineering
Research.details: The focus of the software Engineering group is to develop techniques and methods for advanced and efficient management of Computer Software related to software and IT industry. The group has currently ten MS students and three projects at the BS level.

Research.title: System Research and Laboratory
Research.details: SYSLAB â€“ Systems Research Laboratory is inspired by development and advancements related to Distributed Systems. Specifically, the group is focused on areas of Cloud Computing, High Performance Computing, Network Security, and Mobile and Network Systems. The focus of the group is on design and implementation of efficient systems techniques related to these areas. Currently, there are two PhD. students, five MS students, and four FYP groups working on different areas of systems research.

Research.title: Database and Machine Learning
Research.details: Database and Machine learning deals with the fields of research like, Big Data, Data warehousing, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence.

Research.title: Theoratical Computer Science
Research.details: Database and Machine learning deals with the fields of research like, algorithms, Complexity, Computational Feasibility.
